http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com: Basis for the Equi7 grid for Africa. Designed in 2014 to efficiently handle the archiving, processing, and displaying of high resolution raster data over land while preserving geometric accuracy. The projection is neither conformal nor equal-area.
